New Records: Quinton de Kock became the sixth batter to score three hundreds in a single edition of the tournament
Quinton de Kock overtook Virat Kohli as the highest run-getter with 407 runs in the tournament
Key Match Events: Mahmudullah scored a century for Bangladesh
South Africa scored 144 runs off the last ten overs
South Africa posted a mammoth total of 382 for five
South Africa handed a 149-run defeat to Bangladesh
